title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved. However, the scrollbars do not have any effect. Even with smaller images like icons, the scrollbars are present but do not serve any purpose, making them misleading.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled.
4. Try moving the scrollbars.
5. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect on the image, even with small icons.
